entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Formatting - 3 #75811
  • Area - Misplaced Using Directives #75809
  • "Use Collection Expressions" suggestion still appears even with multiple target frameworks, including those that target C# versions without support for collection expressions #75807
  • Collection initializers can leak refs #75802
  • Find all references to `dynamic` does not work #75800
  • Incremental Generators documentation is missing information about project setup (and more) #75798

Closed

  • Bulk "Use auto property" skips things that it can refactor individually #75634
  • "Use auto property" across a document/project only fixes a few instances per class #26527
    Backlog
  • Remove dependency of Remote.Workspaces on Features, if possible. #43775
    Backlog
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers from 3.3.4 to 3.11.0 Breaks Code #75810
  • Renaming a C# Field Used in a Switch Expression Within a Method to the Name of a Property That Accesses It in a Class Causes Visual Studio 2019 Community 16.5.2+ to Crash #43259
    Backlog
  • UseExpressionBodyForLambdaCodeStyleProvider needs to be rewritten to decouple analyzer and code fix/refactoring pieces #43148
    Backlog
  • Possible NRE: EditorTextFactoryService.CreateText may return null #43040
    Backlog
  • Clean up TemporaryStreamStorage, ITemporaryStorageWithName #43037
    Backlog
  • Interface method Implementation is not placing in correct order #42993
    Backlog
  • More consistent naming of Roslyn related OOP services #42582
    Backlog
  • Should parameters use their method accessibility when applying naming styles? #42037
    Backlog
  • Renamer renames only extension method but not callers in other assembly #41859
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 suggests turning single-line method statements to expression body methods, even if the statement is wrapped in an #if directive. #41596
    Backlog
  • Extract members to partial #41588
    Backlog
  • Update Dialog for Pull Members Up, Extract Interface, and Extract SuperClass #41576
    Backlog
  • Make it possible to run code analysis on multiple files/projects #41545
    Backlog
  • Renaming Method Parameter is Not Applied to XML Comments #41320
    Backlog
  • Project.RemoveDocument() doesn't validate the DocumentId given belongs to the project instance #41211
    Backlog
  • In ASP.NET Razor, Visual Studio throws a NotReferencedException when renaming a class or dictionary referenced in CSHTML file #41020
    Backlog
  • Clean up GetConvertedTypeWithAnnotatedNullability and GetTypeWithAnnotatedNullability #40961
    Backlog
  • C# rename refactoring; bug with macro-conditional code sections #40942
    Backlog
  • Symbol recognition improvement #40796
    Backlog
  • IDE1006 Naming Violation -- need legacy rule #40409
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator.LocalDeclaratoinStatement should be updated to add 'add using' attribute. #39968
    Backlog
  • C#, Not functional "Cancel" button for namespace rename operation #39616
    Backlog
  • Editor: syntax node is not within syntax tree #39296
    Backlog
  • Using the editor dropdown to navigate to Visual Basic event handler is painful #37854
    Backlog
  • locals declared with VarPatternSyntax have their type annotated as nullable, even when expression in IsExpressionSyntax is clearly not null #75804
  • The tuple encounters a nullable inference error when using the LINQ expression FirstOrDefault #75797
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35507.17 #75799
  • `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function seems incorrect #75543
    17.13
  • IntelliSense loses the type of Action<T> parameter only while typing #72571
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Update release/vscode branch with changes in 2.55.21 tag #75814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Telemetry to match VS #75813
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #75552 from dotnet/dev/jorobich/dont-retain-prval-… #75812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update entry point finder to support `async Main` #75808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of 'else' keyword after typing it #75806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update expected test results after recent pattern match change #75805
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data (backport to 17.12) #75803
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data #75796
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix: fix all for Use Auto Property #75788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert single-line raw strings into multi-line on pressing <enter> #75648
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions in OverloadResolution.vb #75790
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
